author: Vivienne Clarke, Paul Cullen
title: Coronavirus: Crisis teams sent to nursing homes as 'disgusting virus' claims hundreds of lives
description: National emergency team will review measures taken to tackle nursing home outbreaks at Friday meeting
content:
Minister for Health Simon Harris has said 18 Covid-19 response teams, including doctors and nurses, are to be deployed to nursing homes around the country, with 61 HSE staff already deployed.
Mr Harris told RTÉs Morning Ireland every union has worked with th… [+4585 chars]
